channel.title: RHCSA Notes - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: RHCSA Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 (UPDATED) - Asghar Here are my notes from Asghar Goriâ€™s RHCSA book. Buy the book or read the reviews here. Track my RHCSA progress: RHCSA_Tracker installation interaction File Management 4_adv_file_management 5_basic_user_management 6_Adv_user_management 7_bash_shell 8_process_and_task_scheduling 9_basic_package_management 10_adv_package_management 11_boot_grub2_kernel 12_sysinit_logging_tuning 13_Storage_Management 14_Local_File_Systems_and_Swap 15_Networking_Network_Devices_and_Network_Connections 16_Network File System 17_Hostname_resolution_and_time_synchronization 18_The_Secure_Shell_Service 19_The_Linux_Firewall 20_Security_Enhanced_Linux 21_Shell_Scripting 22_Containers Sample_exam_1 Sample_exam_2 Sample_exam_3 Sample_exam_4
